item.title: Graduate Research Student Toolkit
item.description: Graduate Research Life The Research Checklist Structuring/Simplifying the Research Process Writing Project Management Project Updates Note-taking Literature Reviews Referencing Statistics Coding Social Media Other Useful Tools Last edited: 14 Aug 2020 An unusually composed graduate student Graduate Research Life If you’ve stubled onto this page, chances are that you’ve recently embarked on your graduate research programme or are somewhere along in your research studies!
